meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetric shape of the cloud caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The artist intentionally created a nonsymmetric painting to evoke emotion.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetric cake looked like it had melted in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsymmetric hairstyle was a bold statement of individuality.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetric pattern on the rug made it stand out in the room.

meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetric butterfly had different wing sizes.
meanings.sent2: The building's design was intentionally made nonsymmetric for a modern look.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetric garden path twisted and turned unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsymmetric outfit clashed in colors but somehow worked.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetric snowflake was a rare and beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: The nonsymmetric face of the clock confused me.
meanings.sent2: The nonsymmetric arrangement of the flowers added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The nonsymmetric dance routine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsymmetric handwriting was difficult to read but full of character.
meanings.sent5: The nonsymmetric building stood out among the uniform structures.
